hero.about: Full Stack Developer with experience in web projects, mainly working with React, Node.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL. I contribute to the development of the Alta Aprovação platform, helping build essential features on both the frontend and backend, while also assisting in onboarding new team members. I also worked in the Data Quality area at Stringhini Varejo Inteligente, consistently exceeding goals and ensuring high-quality deliverables.

stringhini.title: Data Quality at Stringhini
description: Stood out by achieving 100% accuracy in weekly testing during several weeks.
Surpassed the performance point target in more than 43 weeks, contributing directly to the team's and client’s consistent goal achievement.
Worked on early-stage project scopes, maintaining constant communication with management to ensure highly accurate deliverables.

tudeDinizInternship.title: Full Stack Developer Intern at Tude Diniz Tecnologia
description: Led the development of approximately 80% of the frontend for the Alta Aprovação project using React, Material UI, and GraphQL.
Developed the frontend of the strategic 'Verticalized Notice' feature and contributed to the backend with Node.js, TypeScript, TypeORM, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.
Structured and implemented the admin module for the Alta Aprovação HUB, including management of users, notices, subjects, and topics — enabling scalable and fully digital operations.

tudeDinizFulltime.title: Full Stack Developer at Tude Diniz Tecnologia
description: Migrated the frontend from Create React App to Vite, reducing build and development startup times by approximately 60%.
Implemented end-to-end payment integration with Stripe, ensuring secure transactions and expanding the product’s monetization capabilities.
Developed the saved jobs module with automatic email alerts using React, Supabase, and Node.js.

reactTemplate.title: React Template
description: I structured a personal template using Vite, React, TypeScript, and Material UI, focusing on productivity and organization.
The project serves as a starting point for new applications, following a clear architecture and responsive components.

reactTestingSetup.title: React Testing Environment
description: I set up a complete testing environment for React projects using Vitest, React Testing Library, and Cypress.
The setup covers unit, integration, and E2E tests, making it a reusable base for new projects.

nodeGraphqlApi.title: GraphQL API with Node.js
description: I developed a simple API using Node.js, TypeScript, TypeORM, and GraphQL to practice CRUD operations with PostgreSQL.
The structure reinforces best practices such as soft delete, validations, and entity relationships.

javaSpringTemplate.title: Java Spring Backend Template
description: I created a backend skeleton using Spring Boot, JWT, Spring Security, and Flyway, aimed at learning and future real-world use.
The project includes OpenAPI documentation (Springdoc), mappings with MapStruct, and an organization focused on maintainability.

solidPrinciples.title: SOLID Principles in Practice
description: I developed a didactic repository to study and demonstrate the SOLID principles in Java.
The project presents correct and incorrect examples, serving as study and review material.

springBootTests.title: Unit Testing with Spring Boot
description: I practiced unit testing with JUnit 5 and Mockito in a simulated Java backend project.
I focused on covering services with mocked repositories, enhancing code reliability and clarity.
